Career Profile¶

I’m a Software Developer, most of the time I work on software applications backend, mostly with Python and Java.

I have 15 years of experience in designing and implementing complex and distributed software systems. Also I have a basic knowledge in Linux administration/DevOps and work with Kubernetes/Docker and gitlab-ci.

Sometime back I had also worked on frontend, most of the time with BackboneJS.

I have also spent a significant amount of time contributing to opensource software development (predominantly Openstack). Played the role of an active developer and core reviewer in subprojects, like Sushy and Proliantutils, of OpenStack Ironic (Baremetal server provisioning) project.

Moreover I started my career with C++ and had been with it for the initial 6 years of my career.
